title: Smart Data Models - RAMI4.0 Asset Administrtion Shell -AAS- Generic Submodel schema
description: Describes a generic submodel component of the RAMI4.0 Asset Administration Shell

id.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one AAS Submodel from another one within the NGSI context

type.description: Property. It has to be RAMI4.0 I4Submodel NGSI Entity type to represent a RAMI4.0 AAS Digital Twin Submodel component

refI4AssetId.description: Relationship. References the root Asset which this Submodel belongs to

refI4AASId.description: Relationship. References the root Asset Administration Shell which this Submodel belongs to

hasDataSpecification.description: Property. Data specification defines the additional attributes a Submodel may have. RAMI4.0 specification

qualifiers.description: Property. Qualifiers are used if the semantics of the element is the same independent of its qualifiers. It is only the quality or the meaning of the value for the element that differs

submodelElements.description: Property. Data element which includes the list of Elements -Operations or Commands AND Properties- I4SubmodelElementOperation for RAMI commands / I4SubmodelElementProperty for RAMI Properties

items.description: Property. Link to the RAMI40 element -I4SubmodelElementOperation or I4SubmodelElementProperty- that maps the Command/Property of the RAMI Submodel

refSubmodelElement.description: Property. Link to the NGSI entity -I4SubmodelElementOperation or I4SubmodelElementProperty- that maps the Command/Property of the Submodel

identification.description: Property. Identification of the Submodel within its AAS. RAMI4.0 environment

idType.description: Property. Type of the Identifier, eg.IRI or IRDI

id.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one Submodel from another one -NGSI Id-. RAMI4.0 environmet

version.description: AAS Version number is the number in line with release of specification

revision.description: AAS Revision number is the number in line with release of specification

idShort.description: Property. short id is the (short) name of the Submodel within RAMI40 environment

category.description: Property. The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element

modelType.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used.

name.description: Property. Property of the item. Usually Submodel is set for this type.

descriptions.description: Property. For adding detailed knowldedge about the AAS in different languages

language.description: Property. Substring identifying the language. Acronym according to ISO 639-1

text.description: Property. The Description text is filled here

semanticId.description: Property. It refer to an external information source, which explains the formulation of the submodel

keys.description: Property. Keys for the Semantic ID

kind.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used
